title: Did Hillary Clinton suggest that Trump speak to Putin during the Capitol riot?
subtitle: "I historically hope we find out who he's looking at, who's pulling his strings," said the former Democratic presidential candidate for Trump.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, Hillary Clinton, President Donald Trump of the United States, proposed a telephone conversation with Vladimir Putin on the day of the attack on the American Capitol, January 6, 2021.
